description:
When Ren`s manager catches a cold, Kyoko takes over as his manager. Kyoko ends up being busier than expected and winds up making a flurry of mistakes. Yet, during her job as manager, she runs into a group of girls around her age and Ren finally learns the reason why Kyoko didn`t continue on with school.  Also about her past with Sho...
Source: crunchyroll
